updates.title: App Update 1.1.6 & 1.1.7
content: General improvements and optimizations to prepare the app for upcoming features

updates.title: App Update 1.1.5 - New Features
content: You can now easily volunteer for a specific parkrun event! When you click "Sign Up to Volunteer" on the volunteer page, your email application will open with the selected parkrunâ€™s email address automatically filled in the "To" field.

updates.title: App Update 1.1.2 - Map Update
content: The Google Consent Page has been removed, as Google Maps now opens directly within the app.

updates.title: App Update 1.1.1 - New Features
content: Event Cancellations - Displays a hazard marker and cancellation reason in pop-up.
"Always on Display" option is available in settings.

updates.title: App Update 1.1.0 - New Features
content: Button Renaming: The "Hotel" button has been renamed to "Accommodation".
New User Prompt: Upon clicking the "Accommodation" button, users will now be prompted to select either "Hotel" or "Campsites."
